title: Fix 'Writing' navigation - Link to Substack RSS feeds
description:
CRITICAL: Fix broken Writing menu item with proper naming and link.

**Mike's Requirements:**
- Menu should link to RSS feeds from Substack (NOT generic blog)
- Don't call it 'blog' - that's not accurate
- Suggested names: 'Substack Writings' or propose better term
- Current 'Writing' link goes to 404

**Substack Publications:**
1. Resilient Tomorrow (main publication)
2. Operational Intelligence (if active)

**Steps:**
1. Decide on accurate menu label
2. Get Substack RSS feed URL(s)
3. Update Ghost navigation via Admin settings
4. Test link works
